DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to record voice samples of infant's mothers, process in samples to a phonetic musical piece, play the phonetic musical piece to 4-10 month old infants, and then test the infants in a conditioned head turning test in lab, and to analyze the results.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Hearing Discrete Phonemes in Mother's Voice in the Infant's Natural Environment and With Natural Melody on Developing Phonetic Categories Between 4-10 Months Old
DOC.criteria: normal newborn infants males and females age 4 months to 10 months old chronic illness hearing loss history of otitis media serious otitis media
